EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for contacting The MENTOR Network
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Prospects__c.First_Name__c},
Thank you for taking the first step in making a difference in someone’s life. We’re delighted to connect with caring individuals like you and are excited to tell you about our wonderful programs!
As a Mentor partnered with our organization, you can make a meaningful difference in the life of a person with an intellectual or developmental disability or a child in need and earn extra income by opening your heart and your home.
One of our staff members will contact you within 72 hours, but if you need more information immediately, please call our {!Prospects__c.zzEmailBusinessName__c} state office at {!Prospects__c.zzEmailOfficePhone__c}.
Thanks again for your interest in becoming a Mentor!
We look forward to speaking with you.
